venue.name: Star Hill Family Athletic Center Llc

item.description:
You can see who is going on my other site:  "HARTFORD FUN GROUP"

Thank you, Art Jensen

THIS IS A REGULATION SIZE VOLLEYBALL!

Did We Hear You Wanted More Volleyball??

Another location to continue our socializing (Star Hill Family Center, Vernon)

There link is http://www.starhillsports.com/
Day to play is every other Friday..
Place for the after get together is the Vernon Diner
Here is how it works:
1. Please proceed to the dome section.
2. Look for your event host for the night (Cindy)
3. Please pay Cindy the exact amount for the event.

--------$8.00 Dollars----
**DO NOT PAY THE FRONT DESK**
4. Enjoy the friendship of others on 3 volleyball courts from 7:00PM to 9:00PM

5. Proceed to Vernon Diner for after get together:

Directions: Follow Gerber Road to Industrial Park Road West, go left. First light go left onto Hartford Turnpike (route 30) stay on Hartford Turnpike (route 30) for about 3.5 miles, Vernon Diner will be on the right.
item.name: VOLLEYBALL FRIDAY $8.00 (REGULATION SIZE BALL)
